website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel beauty and durability with the classic Victorinox look – durable black, scratch-resistant crystal with the signature red logo.
pros: Solid, sturdy, beautiful, and well-made, this watch features a black dial with white numbers, luminescent hands and rotating bezel
Water-resistant to 300 feet or 100 meters – suitable for swimming and snorkeling
cons: Some wearers report the band is too small, or that models are shipped with an aging or failing battery

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch. Still ticking... haven't even needed a new battery yet. Great style -goes with all my black or dark suites for work and sporty stuff at home. A real winner!
customer_reviews.author: MGG

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Watch band is nicely made and comfortable (moves freely, is not "clunky"). Band width is 5/8ths of an inch. Watch face is approximately 1.25 inches (complete diameter to edge of watch body). The watch is functioning very well and seems of high quality. Great watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Such a Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: Such a Beautiful watch.! I have brought this for my wife... She is very happy and now she wants to buy the white dial too..!! It looks amazing. It came all the way to Kuwait with out any problems, The packaging was good. Thank you Amazon and Flying Fashion for your good job.
customer_reviews.author: Daris

customer_reviews.title: My mother loves this watch
customer_reviews.text: Packaged and presented really well, it also came with an eco bag and a cleaning cloth. Price is very good and the quality of the watch is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife has small wrists and this watch fits her perfectly, nether too big nor too small just perfect!! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Vini M.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my watch
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my watch...The packing is very elegant, everything about this was handled to the higher standard . Very highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LILLIE CRITCHFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It is large enough for me to read the date easily. Have always loved having a bezel ring. It is large but light weight and feels great on my wrist, and my wrist is small.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great watch for my wife. She loves it. Solid and sturdy. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Foster

customer_reviews.title: I had one for 6 year prior to purchasing her they are a great watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got it for Christmas and cried when she lost it in the lake so we got her another one it holds up to everything. I had one for 6 year prior to purchasing her they are a great watch for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. The size was just right, not to big or small. Once on the wrist it had an expensive look to it, she really enjoyed. I lucked out in that the box and presentation the watch came in gave it the WOW factor too.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Aceves

customer_reviews.title: It in no way looks or feels like a $140 watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very cheap feeling and looking compared to the picture. It has no weight to it and the links have allot of space between them giving them a very cheap look. It in no way looks or feels like a $140 watch. More like a $30 watch. Don't waist your money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: only one issue
customer_reviews.text: the watch is very good , i like the model the size , the only thing that when it came was not working properly i had to change the battery , after this its working good , but i didnt expect that i have to change the battery of a new watch , never happened to me before
customer_reviews.author: samar hassan

product_meta.title: Victorinox Swiss Army Women's 241348 Summit XLT Watch
product_meta.description:
Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Unidirectional rotating black PVD bezel with 60 minute markings. Black dial with luminous hands and white Arabic numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. GMT scale. Luminiscent hands and dial markers. Date display at the 4 o'clock position. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant hardened mineral crystal. Protected steel crown. Stainless steel case back. Case diameter: 32 mm. Case thickness: 8 mm. Fold over clasp with safety. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: hours, minutes, center seconds, date. Victorinox Summit XLT Chrono Ladies Watch 241348.

Sophisticated materials, a classic look, and technical excellence combine in the Victorinox Swiss Army women's Summit XLT Watch #241348. This timepiece offers a black dial with white Arabic numeral indexes, small Arabic numerals for tracking 24-hour time, a minute tracker, a date window at four o'clock, luminous hour and minute hands, and a white second hand. This watch also offers a stainless steel unidirectional bezel that features a black finish and white Arabic numeral indexes at five-minute intervals. Its 32-millimeter stainless steel case includes a screw-in caseback, while the stainless steel bracelet band is held in place by fold over clasp with safety and comes with a diver's extension. This Summit XLT watch offers the protection of shock-resistant mineral crystal. It is powered by Swiss quartz movement, and it is water resistant to 330 feet (100 meters).



Victorinox Swiss Army – HistoryMaster Cutler Karl Elsener opened a cutlery shop in Ibach, Switzerland in 1884. Seven years later, in 1891, Karl supplied the Swiss Army with its standard issue Soldier’s Knife. After the death of his mother in 1909, Karl Elsener introduced the brand name Victoria and the iconic Cross and Shield emblem is registered as a trademark. With the advent of stainless steel, Karl Elsener coined the company’s name, Victorinox, by combining his mother’s name with “inox”, an abbreviation of the French word for rust-resistant steel, “inoxydable”. After World War II, the “Original Swiss Army Knife” began its successful progression around the world and enjoyed exceptional popularity. In 1989, Victorinox entered the timepiece business in the United States under the brand name “Swiss Army”. Ten years later, Victorinox joined the Travel Gear market, partnering with TRG Group in St. Louis. And in 2001, Victorinox fashion was introduced in the US to further capture the brand’s essence of practical luxury. In 2002, in order to promote global unity, the Victorinox Swiss Army timepiece brand was launched internationally. In 2007, Victorinox set up Victorinox Swiss Army Fragrance AG, and in 2009 Victorinox Swiss Unlimited was launched. 2014 marks Victorinox Swiss Army’s 130th anniversary, and each Victorinox Swiss Army product embodies the spirit of the Legendary Original Swiss Army Knife, a universal symbol of Functionality, Innovation, Quality and Iconic Design.

Brand Values

FUNCTIONALITY

Our Victorinox Swiss Army timepieces are designed to optimize their usefulness. Functionality ranges from easy-to-read dial designs to sophisticated professional functions. Every design detail is purpose-based. Functions are never add-ons or embellishments. The goal is to create watches that are timeless.

INNOVATION

Victorinox Swiss Army constantly enhances its timepiece lines with new design elements and innovative functions while seeking creative ways of upgrading existing components to enhance their capabilities.

QUALITY

Victorinox Swiss Army timepieces are designed and manufactured with the same rigorous attention to quality as the brand’s legendary Pocket Tools. They also meet the highest standards of the Swiss watchmaking industry. The quality controls and testing that every timepiece undergoes (material, movement, assembly, finishing, etc.) allow Victorinox Swiss Army to offer a three-year limited warranty.

ICONIC DESIGN

The Original Swiss Army Knife is one of the world’s most functional pieces of design. Victorinox Swiss Army timepieces share this icon’s spirit and heritage. They are multifunctional precision instruments engineered to last, yet also timeless and contemporary in design.



See more

feature_bullets: Water resistant to 330 feet (100 M): suitable for snorkeling, as well as swimming, but not diving
